# Exclude test files and directories from TruffleHog secret scanning
# Test files may contain mock credentials, test data, and fixtures

# Test directories
tests/
__tests__/
*.test.ts
*.test.tsx
*.spec.ts
*.spec.tsx

# Test fixtures and mocks
tests/fixtures/
tests/mocks/
__mocks__/
*.mock.ts
*.mock.tsx

# Test factories
tests/factories/

# E2E tests
tests/e2e/

# Coverage and reports
coverage/
.nyc_output/
